document_data.name: Juniper
document_data.mainbody:
'''Juniper''' was an [[owlbear]] that lived in the [[Feywild]] realm of [[Thither]] in the domain of [[Prismeer]].{{Cite comic/Dungeons & Dragons Annual 2022}}

{{Quote|Gro-gro-grooo!|Juniper, upon being asked if she likes pork jerky.}}
document_data.Personality: Juniper was highly motivated by food. She much more preferred meat to berries.
document_data.Possessions: The boss of Juniper's chariot harness was embossed with an engraving of a [[juniper]] branch.
document_data.Activities:
[[File:Juniper and elf.png|thumb|right|350px|''Juniper, sitting very still, with her flaxen-haired elf companion.'']]
The mighty owlbear traveled across Thither with her companion, an [[elven]] man. Juniper pulled a finely-crafted chariot atop which her companion rode.
document_data.History:
At some point, Juniper was tricked by a [[Billi Sharpe|human woman]] and a [[Clipper|harengon]] to transport them aboard her chariot. Juniper chased after a morsel of food they used to entice her and ran full speed across the plains of Thither. Unfortunately, their joyride came to an abrupt end when Juniper crashed into the [[sprite]] community of [[Honeyhollow Fortress]]. Juniper was left a bit dazed, while the joyriders were taken captive by the resident sprites.

Some time later, Juniper's elf companion went missing. He was believed to have been abducted by the [[jabberwock]] that laired deep within the [[Palace of Heart's Desire]].
